snippet.title: FragPunk - Official Release Date Trailer | The Game Awards 2024
snippet.description:
Hate the rules? Change them! FragPunk, the free-to-play fast-paced 5v5 tactical hero shooter that bends the rules of combat is coming to PC (Steam & Epic Game Store), PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S on March 6, 2025 (PST) with all Shard Cards free to unlock permanently!
FragPunk brings a fresh blend of fun to the competitive FPS scene with its unique mix of tactical 5v5 combat, enhanced heroes named Lancers and most importantly, powerful gameplay modifiers called Shard Cards that bend the rules of every match! By mixing and matching Lancers, weapons, and Shard Cards, FragPunk promises chaotic fun for players of all skill levels.

Wishlist now!
Official Site - https://www.fragpunk.com/#/ 
Twitter/X - https://x.com/PlayFragPunk 
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6Y3O2aAJf6orASsPAI9ElA

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards
